channel.title: Please Help, Few simple questions(i think)
channel.description: Ok, well i just got the "starter scape" thing to start my server, i did it all and changed the name, but when i run the server and log on, it has a window when you first log on that says "welcome to starterscape!" - how do i change that and the other stuff thats on that window. The next question is, How do i make myself owner. The next question is, how do i change where people are in the game and make them have a store selling items make then talk. The next question is this: When i ran starterscape i noticed that it is a PK server and i only want to make PKing in sertain places like THE WILD, and DUAL ARENA. The next question is how to make commands for: The Owner only(me), The co-owner only[b](WHO EVER HELPS ME BUILD THIS SERVER WILL GET CO-OWNER!)[/b], The Admins only, The mods only, and the players only. THANKS i think that these are the last of my questions for now, sorry if there was guides for these but i could not find them.

item.title: Please Help, Few simple questions(i think)
item.dc:creator: @trippany trippany
item.description:
@trippany wrote:

Okay, thanks i got that worked out now…can someone that has aim and knows alot about server coding and stuff please IM me my sn is trippany13…THANKS!

item.title: Please Help, Few simple questions(i think)

item.description:
@bryan_m wrote:

go to npchandeler and client.java use ctrl H and use this search: starterscape
replace:server name

item.title: Please Help, Few simple questions(i think)

@trippany wrote:

Ok, well i just got the “starter scape” thing to start my server, i did it all and changed the name, but when i run the server and log on, it has a window when you first log on that says “welcome to starterscape!” - how do i change that and the other stuff thats on that window. The next question is, How do i make myself owner. The next question is, how do i change where people are in the game and make them have a store selling items make then talk. The next question is this: When i ran starterscape i noticed that it is a PK server and i only want to make PKing in sertain places like THE WILD, and DUAL ARENA. The next question is how to make commands for: The Owner only(me), The co-owner only(WHO EVER HELPS ME BUILD THIS SERVER WILL GET CO-OWNER!), The Admins only, The mods only, and the players only.
